sentences.en: All I fear will succumb before the tremendous array of negative arguments and forces.
sentences.cn: 我所引以为忧的这一切会在消极论调和消极力量形成的巨大堡垒前面,化成泡影.

sentences.en: Businesses succumb to competition and disappear.
sentences.cn: 企业可能在竞争下覆亡.

sentences.en: Cry to succumb, not quite firm?
sentences.cn: 哭是不是屈服, 不够坚强?

sentences.en: Don't succumb to the temptation to have just one cigarette.
sentences.cn: 不要屈服于只抽一支烟的诱惑。

sentences.en: I was determined not to succumb to the virus.
If it beats you sometimes, dare again and it will succumb.
sentences.cn: 如果有时候你被打败了,不断地挑战, 它总会屈服的.

sentences.en: If it beats you sometimes, dare it again and again and it will succumb.
sentences.cn: 如果有时候你被它打败了, 不断地挑战,它总会屈服的.

sentences.en: Malnourished children are more likely to succumb to infections.
sentences.cn: 营养不良的儿童更有可能死于感染.

sentences.en: Most of us are known to succumb to persuasion through the media.
sentences.cn: 我们之中的大多数人都抵挡不住传播媒介的宣传.

sentences.en: Several children have measles, and the others are bound to succumb ( to it ).
sentences.cn: 有几个孩子患了麻疹, 其他孩子也必然传染上.

sentences.en: They will never succumb to the enemies.
They would not succumb to this Titan who was bent on undoing them.
sentences.cn: 他们不愿向这个专门要损害他们的“巨人”让步.

sentences.en: Though she still has cravings sometimes even now, she doesn't succumb.
sentences.cn: 虽然现在,她有时仍然想吸烟, 但她能克服了.

sentences.en: Will business leaders succumb to these ideas?
sentences.cn: 商业领袖们会被这些观点折服 吗 ?

sentences.en: Yet Caroline refused tamely to succumb.
sentences.cn: 然而,卡罗琳不肯就此乖乖地屈服.

sentences.en: Yue Niang initially to succumb to her fate but is finally determined to make her escape.
sentences.cn: 月娘本来想要认命,但是最后还是决定不向命运屈服.

trans.tran_en: to stop opposing someone or something that is stronger than you, and allow them to take control
to stop opposing someone or something that is stronger than you, and allow them to take control
